The experimental group undertake training inspiratory plus expiratory muscle Threshold® IMT Threshold™ PEP regulate 40 % subject ' maximal inspiratory pressure ( MIP ) maximal expiratory pressure ( MEP ) value , five times/week eight week 30 minutes/day .
